Firefly has a history of many glitches in just-released software.
I, for one, won't judge by the glitches.
The stronghold series has always intrigued me, and I am now looking forward to playing this, glitches or not.
@ncc46537 It's not the glitches.. It's what they didnt add.. I mean come on no enemy AI? only a few maps... lol The best thing about this game is the awesome map editor.

I'll reserve judgement for a few months, you know, when it's supposed to be finished downloading for me.
